metadata.name: The One
metadata.description:
Our dimensions are vibrantly dynamic in nature.  
"Philia" is a Greek word to signify a certain kind of closeness.  
The piece is a colorful representation of the fundamental relationship I have with art, the way that the act of painting and I become one in the creative process.  
I invite you to see the certain points I become in realization of communion and where I have found the places to begin our conversation together.  
The painting of mine is digitally created, its size 11812 x 11812 pixels.

Giant Games is a small editions collection that reflects on how we play with what we care about.
